img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cd/Wukong_UpperHollow_14.jpg)
Grab the green Wisp near where the archer was posted, and continue on through another large cave full of more cocoons, with some Puppet Ticks tending to them, and a few Wasp Guai stuck in the cocoons. They can be a little tricky to pin down with their constant darting around, so either bait them into diving into a Rock Solid, or use your Thrust or Pillar Stance to knock them out of the air.
img_below_text:
As you near the end of the passage, keep your eyes on the right to spot a small alcove where the glow of a green Wisp will entice you over to investigate. There's a few Puppet Spiders waiting to ambush you when you draw close, however.
![Wukong UpperHollow 16.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b8/Wukong_UpperHollow_16.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 16 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong UpperHollow 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cd/Wukong_UpperHollow_14.jpg)
Grab the green Wisp near where the archer was posted, and continue on through another large cave full of more cocoons, with some Puppet Ticks tending to them, and a few Wasp Guai stuck in the cocoons. They can be a little tricky to pin down with their constant darting around, so either bait them into diving into a Rock Solid, or use your Thrust or Pillar Stance to knock them out of the air."
            - Following Text: "As you near the end of the passage, keep your eyes on the right to spot a small alcove where the glow of a green Wisp will entice you over to investigate. There's a few Puppet Spiders waiting to ambush you when you draw close, however.
![Wukong UpperHollow 16.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b8/Wukong_UpperHollow_16.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character is navigating through a dark, web-filled cave. The character is approaching a glowing green Wisp, which is highlighted in the distance. The preceding text describes the player encountering Wasp Guai and Puppet Ticks in a large cave, while the following text warns of Puppet Spiders lying in ambush near a green Wisp in a small alcove. The image serves to illustrate the player's journey through the cave and the imminent encounter with the green Wisp and potential ambush.
